amendment.description: At the end of division C (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XXXX. None of the funds made available by this Act to the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 118 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit the ATF from reclassifying the M855 ammunition as armor piercing ammunition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A114) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A114) offered by Mr. Latta.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A114) Agreed to by voice vote.
